name: NO_AIM_GAME(DEMO)
description:
physical animation game. This has no aim offset or any type of aiming. the player interacts with objects to try and find an angle to shoot the enemies.

i actually enjoyed playing this and will continue to work on it

Made by a single beginner dev.

Follow project here
